scripts.copy-js3party: del-cli build/js3party/**/* && copyfiles -u 1 js3party/**/*.* build/js3party/ && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/fuse.js/dist/fuse.min.mjs build/js3party/fuse && copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/three/**/* build/js3party/three && copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/troika-three-text/**/* build/js3party/troika-three-text && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/troika-three-utils/src/**/* build/js3party/troika-three-utils && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/troika-worker-utils/src/**/* build/js3party/troika-worker-utils && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/webgl-sdf-generator/dist/**/* build/js3party/webgl-sdf-generator && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bidi-js/dist/**/* build/js3party/bidi-js
scripts.build-animations: npm run --prefix ../animations build && npm run --prefix ../animations offload
scripts.build: del-cli build/**/* !build/js3party && npm run transpile && npm run copy-files && npm run copy-assets && npm run asl-transpile
scripts.asl-transpile: del-cli asl-js && copyfiles -u 2 build/modules-async/**/*.js ./asl-js && del-cli build/modules-async/**/*.js && babel asl-js --out-dir build/modules-async --config-file ./asl-babel.config.js
